definition: drunken gluttony (idiom); eating and drinking to excess

sentences.english: It was easier just to leave the relationship than to leave my bulimic lifestyle of 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 结束一段关系比改掉我25年的暴食症要容易得多。

sentences.english: Kwashiorkor survivors did not overeat in this way.
sentences.chinese: 得过夸希奥科病的人就不会这样暴饮暴食。

sentences.english: But if a person is a feaster, scientists believe they produce less of the gut hormone.
sentences.chinese: 但科学家认为，贪吃型暴食者分泌的这种荷尔蒙更少。

sentences.english: If so, you meet the criteria for theproposed new condition of "binge eating disorder".
sentences.chinese: 如果是的话，你满足拟议的新诊断“暴食症”的标准。

sentences.english: Ironically, it's the very anxiety that can lead to overeating.
sentences.chinese: 而讽刺的是，就是这种焦虑感会导致他们暴食暴饮。

sentences.english: It will lead to bulimia later destabilizing relations in a group.
sentences.chinese: 这样会导致暴食症影响将来它们将来在族群中的关系。

sentences.english: Members of Overeaters Anonymous(OA), for example, say they are "abstaining from overeating."
sentences.chinese: 例如，暴食匿名会的会员都说他们在“戒除暴食。”

sentences.english: Members of Overeaters Anonymous(OA), for example, say they are "abstaining from overeating."
sentences.chinese: 例如，暴食匿名会的会员都说他们在“戒除暴食。”

sentences.english: Over-eating is absolutely do not reduce fat, also is not conducive to health.
sentences.chinese: 暴饮暴食是绝对减不了肥的，也是不利于健康的。

sentences.english: Many people, especially women, deal with stress by overeating.
sentences.chinese: 许多人，尤其是女性，以暴饮暴食来排解压力。

sentences.english: Heavy eating seems to bring on the pain. Coule this be the reason for it?
sentences.chinese: 暴食后似乎就带来疼痛。这是发病的原因吗？

sentences.english: I binged on ice cream and snacks for an entire day when my boy friend broke up with me.
sentences.chinese: 男朋友和我分手了，我暴食了一整天的冰淇淋和零食。

sentences.english: On occasion, she has used laxatives after binging to avoid gaining weight.
sentences.chinese: 有时，她会在暴饮暴食后使用泻剂，以避免体重增加。

sentences.english: Ringwood said treatment includes cognitive behavioural therapy.
sentences.chinese: 林伍德表示，暴食的治疗方法包括认知行为治疗。

sentences.english: They can overeat and gainweight if they want to.
sentences.chinese: 如果愿意，他们可以暴饮暴食，增加体重。

sentences.english: Researchers said that it is unlikely that binge eating would lead to the gene variants.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员说暴饮暴食不太可能会导致基因变异。

definition: to save food/to go on a diet
to gobble up/to gorge oneself on (food)
to put on weight/to get fat
to eat and drink gluttonously/to pig out
